name: Rub a Dub Tropicana - Riddim Conference & Iggy Dob
description:
We are very happy to present the work of this great planetary union between Tokyo-Japan and Puerto Escondido-Mexico.

Riddim Conference aka Shanty-Nob and Iggy Dob bring us this new musical union with six tracks based on their perception of Dub Reggae and Rub a dub.

Beats sequenced by Iggy Dob under a line eighties and melodies by the great musician Shanty-Nob make this piece something unique fresh and new.
relax and play this new musical union.

All songs are produced by Shanty-Nob and Iggy Dob.
Mastered at Rosaion Records year 2020

Take care and listen to music we love you.
